instructions.primary: Please consult the Supabase quick_export snapshot file specified in files.assistant_context (SupabaseInfo.txt) first for current DB data and schema information.
instructions.secondary: If you still need higher-level app guidance or conventions, consult ASSISTANT_CONTEXT.md next.
instructions.fallback: If more live database/schema context is required beyond the exported snapshot, use the Supabase CLI locally: `supabase login`, `supabase link --project-ref <ref>`, `supabase db pull`, and `supabase gen types typescript --linked > supabase.types.ts`.
